PicMyMed
This project is an Android application that allows patients to track the progression of their health problems by uploading records. It allows patients to have easy communication with the doctor.

GitHub(PicMyMed)

Search For Omen
This is a story based game that has been created by using the RPG Maker Mv and javascript. Together with a team of six members, we designed a game that is fun, intuitive and suitable for ages.

GitHub(SearchForOmen)
